page.title: 18CHURCHILL PLAYING FIELDS
page.content: {C}hurchill Playing Fields is a large open space. There is a big field in which you can play football or some other sport. It has also got a running track. There is a park as well. In the park there are swings,slides,climbing frames,stepping stones and tunnels. A lot of people go there mostly children. On a Sunday when it is not raining,a lot of people go there. People go there when they are taking a dog for a walk,because the dog can run around the field. Just recently there has been a tractor built for the younger ones to play on. It is a climbing frame with a slide.
